product_name: SmartWool NTS Microweight 150 Crew Long Underwear Top - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The formfitting SmartWool NTS Microweight 150 Crew Long Underwear Top is made from soft, breathable merino wool, making it ideal as a base layer for active adventures on cold days. Jersey-knit, fine merino wool helps maintain a comfortable temperature whether the day is hot, cold or in between. With a UPF 30 rating, fabric provides very good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. SmartWool items are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. Chafe-free flatlock side seams increase comfort. Easy care: machine wash and dry on cool temperature setting. Closeout.
